sn44.10:1.1: Atha kho vacchagotto paribbajako yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
sn44.10:1.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbajako bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn44.10:1.7: Atha kho vacchagotto paribbajako utthayasana pakkami.
sn44.10:2.1: Atha kho ayasma anando acirapakkante vacchagotte paribbajake bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn44.10:2.2: “kim nu kho, bhante, bhagava vacchagottassa paribbajakassa panham puttho na byakasi”ti?
sn44.10:2.3: “Ahancananda, vacchagottassa paribbajakassa ‘atthatta’ti puttho samano ‘atthatta’ti byakareyyam, ye te, ananda, samanabrahmana sassatavada tesametam saddhim abhavissa.
sn44.10:2.4: Ahancananda, vacchagottassa paribbajakassa ‘natthatta’ti puttho samano ‘natthatta’ti byakareyyam, ye te, ananda, samanabrahmana ucchedavada tesametam saddhim abhavissa.
sn44.10:2.5: Ahancananda, vacchagottassa paribbajakassa ‘atthatta’ti puttho samano ‘atthatta’ti byakareyyam, api nu me tam, ananda, anulomam abhavissa nanassa uppadaya:
sn44.10:2.8: “Ahancananda, vacchagottassa paribbajakassa ‘natthatta’ti puttho samano ‘natthatta’ti byakareyyam, sammulhassa, ananda, vacchagottassa paribbajakassa bhiyyo sammohaya abhavissa:
sn44.10:2.9: ‘ahuva me nuna pubbe atta, so etarahi natthi’”ti.
